night: Night is purer than day; it is better for thinking, loving, and dreaming. At night everything is more intense, more true. The echo of words that have been spoken during the day takes on a new and deeper meaning

The deeper the grief, the closer is God!

evening: Evenings are the beautifully sweet spot between the harsh light of the day and the dead darkness of awareness.
